key_talking_points: The first period is underway with Florida leading Edmonton 5-4.
Aleksander Barkov won the opening faceoff against Leon Draisaitl.
Sam Reinhart almost scored early, ringing a shot off the crossbar behind Stuart Skinner.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game has started with some moderate activity, including a missed shot off the crossbar. The score is close, so maintaining awareness of the play is important, but there's also room for some brief analysis.

high_intensity_events.summary: A. Barkov (away) wins faceoff against L. Draisaitl (home) at center ice.
S. Reinhart (away) misses a shot, hitting the crossbar. Goalie S. Skinner (home) in net.
